      • getView

        public View getView(java.lang.String path,
           java.lang.Boolean editMode,
           Context context)
        Description copied from class: Illustration
        Returns the contents of the illustration in a View object for Activities to display. If editMode is True, the illustration will return an editable view. If editMode is False, the illustration will return a non-editable view. XXX: Needs review; should use generic types
        Specified by:

        Returns:
        the View object containing the contents of the illustration
